title: Ethotho Ethotho Lyrics Ra Ra Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Ethotho Ethotho     
Artist(s): Haricharan 
Lyricist: Na. Muthukumar 
Music: Srikanth Deva

Ethotho Ethotho Kanavai tharukindraai.
Ada ennule ennule kulapam tharukindrai
Ethotho Ethotho Kanavai tharukindraai.
Adi ennule ennule kulapam tharukindrai

Idhu natpa kadhala natpa kadhala
Suttrida vaikindrai
Adi rekkai indri rngo ennai
parandhida vaikindrai
Idhu natpa kadhala natpa kadhala
Suttrida vaikindrai
En vayadhil oram penne vandhu
Poochedi vaikindrai

Idhelloram idheloram hey eraalam 
vaarithaigal thondrum
Indrundhalum irundhaalu en
nenjodu nenjodu mounam

Ethotho Ethotho Kanavai tharukindraai.
Ada ennule ennule kulapam tharukindrai
Idhu natpa kadhala natpa kadhala
Suttrida vaikindrai
En vayadhil oram penne vandhu
Poochedi vaikindrai

THoorathil nindralum, pakkathil therikindrai
Pakkthil nindralo, thoorathil therikindrai
Nenjukul sila neram, thooralgal tharukindrai
Thooralgal thandhaalum, veppathai viduindrai

Enna solla penne idhu etho pudhu ekkam 
Kanna vittu pochu sila naala en thookam

Ethotho Ethotho Kanavai tharukindraai..   
Idhu natpa kadhala kadhala natpa ...

Veetukul indrundhalum, nenjukul nulaikindrai
Veliye naan ponaalum ulle ne varukindrai
Thaeniyin sootai pol, ullnenjil sudukinrai
Suttalum nenjukule thithipai tharukindrai

Vathikuchi pola, thalamela oru baaram
Natha kootai pola, sumanthene sila neram

Ethotho Ethotho Kanavai tharukindraai.
Ada ennule ennule kulapam tharukindrai
Idhu natpa kadhala kadhala natpa ...
Idhu natpa kadhala natpa kadhala ....

seo.description: Get the complete Ethotho Ethotho Lyrics Ra Ra Song Lyrics from Ra Ra. Read the lyrics penned by Na Muthukumar and composed by Srikanth Deva and sung by Haricharan. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Na Muthukumar, Ra Ra, Srikanth Deva, Haricharan, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
